Plot: In an alternate Victorian Age world, a group of famous contemporary fantasy, SF and adventure characters team up on a secret mission.
Title: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
Writer: Alan Moore (comic books), Kevin O'Neill (comic books), James Robinson (screenplay)
Actors: Sean Connery, Naseeruddin Shah, Peta Wilson, Tony Curran
tomatoConsensus: Just ordinary. LXG is a great premise ruined by poor execution.
